Pre-Game Insights: The Blue Jays have won six of their last nine games as road underdogs against AL West opponents following a road loss.
The Rangers have lost seven of their last eight Thursday games against AL East opponents.
The Blue Jays have covered the run line in each of their last four games against American League opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven of the Rangers' last eight home games against AL East opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Seven of the Blue Jays' last nine road games after playing the previous day have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Rangers' last four games.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Blue Jays' last three games at Globe Life Field.
